p: Medicinal plants produce primary and secondary metabolites, that, in addition to providing health benefits to humans, may have an original intended use in the plant as biological defenses against herbivores [ 8]. The plant kingdom (including microbes, lichens, algae, and higher plants) produces an estimated 600,000 to 700,000 phytochemicals, with at least 150,000 to 200,000 being bioactive compounds [ 9].
